s.text: The NYT waits until the beginning of its jump to reveal the reason Gore holds an advantage over Bradley among black voters: he's riding Clinton's coattails.
The leader of Serbia's Tigers, a paramilitary group notorious for murdering and/or terrorizing non-Serbs, was killed in Belgrade.

Gore's and Bush's war chests seem to be giving them a boost in Iowa, and both candidates hope strong showings in the caucuses will boost their chances in New Hampshire the following week, the Post reports.
